participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and determined, always striving to achieve her goals.
participant_1.background: i won homecoming queen this year. my current goal is to run a k. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i am currently in high school.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Shy and introverted, often feeling like an outsider.
participant_2.background: i do not have many friends. i hate school. i am a 12 year old girl. i love to play pobox.

content.text: do you want to talk with me?
